stanza.line: Let not my love be called idolatryidolatry
Nor my beloved as an idol showshow
Since all alike my songs and praises bebe
To one of one still such and ever soso
Kind is my love to-day to-morrow kindkind
Still constant in a wondrous excellenceexcellence
Therefore my verse to constancy confinedconfined
One thing expressing leaves out differencedifference
Fair kind and true is all my argumentargument
Fair kind and true varying to other wordswords
And in this change is my invention spentspent
Three themes in one which wondrous scope affordsaffords
Fair kind and true have often lived alonealone
Which three till now never kept seat in oneone
